channel.title: Female Appearance 667
channel.description:
src\com\rs\game\player\Appearence.java:273: error: possible loss of precision look[1] = 1000; // Beard ^ required: byte found: int
[img]http://i.imgur.com/haiMxxL.png[/img]
Any fixes?:/

item.title: Female Appearance 667
item.dc:creator: @Psykotic Psykotic
item.description:
@Psykotic wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:526192”][quote author=Psykotic link=topic=644936.msg4338713#msg4338713 date=1374785794]
src\com\rs\game\player\Appearence.java:273: error: possible loss of precision
look[1] = 1000; // Beard
^
required: byte
found: int

Any fixes?
[/quote]

oracle:

byte: The byte data type is an 8-bit signed two’s complement integer. It has a minimum value of -128 and a maximum value of 127 (inclusive). The byte data type can be useful for saving memory in large arrays, where the memory savings actually matters. They can also be used in place of int where their limits help to clarify your code; the fact that a variable’s range is limited can serve as a form of document.

The number you’re trying to use is too high. It can only go as high as 127 and you’re making it go in the thousands.[/quote]

Doesn’t seem to work…

Read full topic

item.title: Female Appearance 667
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Psykotic, post:1, topic:526192”]src\com\rs\game\player\Appearence.java:273: error: possible loss of precision
look[1] = 1000; // Beard
^
required: byte
found: int

Any fixes?:/[/quote]

byte: The byte data type is an 8-bit signed two's complement integer. It has a minimum value of -128 and a maximum value of 127 (inclusive). The byte data type can be useful for saving memory in large arrays, where the memory savings actually matters. They can also be used in place of int where their limits help to clarify your code; the fact that a variable's range is limited can serve as a form of document.

The number you’re trying to use is too high. It can only go as high as 127 and you’re making it go in the thousands.
